sentence.Network_en: It is gross incivility to refuse answer when spoken to.
sentence.Network_cn: 当人家找你说话时拒绝答应是极其无礼的事.

sentence.Network_en: Was not this some excuse for incivility , if I was uncivil?
sentence.Network_cn: 即使我刚才真是无礼,难道这不是我无礼的某种起因 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: A foretastes of seriousness of incivility is suggested by what has been happening in Houston.
sentence.Network_cn: 休斯顿所发生的情况预示:如果不讲文明,讲产生何种严重后果.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French incivilité or late Latin incivilitas, from Latin incivilis, from in- 'not' + civilis 'of a citizen' (see civil)
